heroDescription: The name peso was given to the 8-real silver coin introduced in 1497, minted at 83⁄8 pesos to a Castilian mark. It was minted in large quantities after the discovery of silver in Mexico.
heroVideoDescription: The video shows one guild attacking another guild. Enjoy the gameplay right now.
heroText: The name peso was given to the 8-real silver coin introduced in 1497, minted at 83⁄8 pesos to a Castilian mark. It was minted in large quantities after the discovery of silver in Mexico.
